parts.text: {"word":"operations","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"手術","english_definition":"a surgical procedure performed on a patient.","examples":[{"sentence":"He had an operation to remove his appendix.","translation":"彼は虫垂を取り除く手術を受けた。"},{"sentence":"The operation was successful.","translation":"手術は成功した。"},{"sentence":"She needs an operation on her knee.","translation":"彼女は膝の手術が必要です。"}],"collocations":["undergo an operation (手術を受ける)","have an operation (手術を受ける)","successful operation (成功した手術)","major operation (大手術)","minor operation (小手術)"],"synonyms":["surgery","procedure"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"事業、業務、活動、操業","english_definition":""the fact or condition of functioning or being active.","examples":[{"sentence":"The company's operations are based in London.","translation":"その会社の事業拠点はロンドンにあります。"},{"sentence":"Military operations began last night.","translation":"軍事作戦は昨夜始まった。"},{"sentence":"The factory is now in full operation.","translation":"工場は現在フル操業中です。"}],"collocations":["business operations (事業運営)","military operations (軍事作戦)","day-to-day operations (日々の業務)","start operations (操業を開始する)","cease operations (操業を停止する)","smooth operations (円滑な運営)"],"synonyms":["activity","functioning","working","process","procedure","management","administration"],"antonyms":["inactivity","shutdown","closure"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"（数学の）演算","english_definition":"a process or action, such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division, performed according to established rules.","examples":[{"sentence":"Addition is a basic mathematical operation.","translation":"足し算は基本的な数学の演算です。"},{"sentence":"The calculator can perform complex operations.","translation":"その電卓は複雑な演算を実行できます。"}],"collocations":["mathematical operation (数学的演算)","arithmetic operation (算術演算)","binary operation (二項演算)","perform an operation (演算を実行する)"],"synonyms":["calculation","computation","process","manipulation"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"「operation」は、ラテン語の「operatio」（働き、活動、仕事）に由来します。これは「operari」（働く、活動する）から派生し、「opus」（仕事、作品）と関連があります。元々は一般的な「働き」「活動」を意味していましたが、14世紀後半には外科手術の意味でも使われるようになりました。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˌɒpəˈreɪʃənz/","syllables":"op-er-a-tions"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"operations"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**operations**」は複数形で使われることが多く、文脈によって意味が大きく異なります。医療の文脈では「手術」を指し、ビジネスや軍事の文脈では「事業」「業務」「作戦」といった意味になります。数学の文脈では「演算」を指します。単数形の「operation」も同様の意味で使用されますが、複数形の方がより一般的な活動やプロセスを指すことが多いです。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ The operation was success.","correct":"✓ The operation was a success.","note":"「success」は名詞であり、「a」が必要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is good at math operation.","correct":"✓ He is good at math operations.","note":"数学の演算を指す場合は、複数形の「operations」が一般的です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The company operation is expanding.","correct":"✓ The company's operations are expanding.","note":"会社全体の事業活動を指す場合は、複数形の「operations」が適切です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["operate (動詞: 操作する、手術する、事業を行う)","operational (形容詞: 操作可能な、作戦上の、業務上の)","operator (名詞: 操作者、オペレーター、事業者)"],"phrasal_verbs":["operate on (～を手術する)","operate under (～の下で活動する)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**operations**」は、いくつかの意味を持つ単語です。最も一般的なのは、ビジネスや軍事などの活動を指す場合です。例えば、「会社の事業活動」や「軍事作戦」などです。また、医療の分野では「手術」を意味します。さらに、数学では「演算」という意味で使われます。文脈によって意味が異なるため、注意が必要です。複数形で使われることが多いですが、単数形の「operation」も同様の意味で使用されます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The hospital performs hundreds of **operations** each year.","translation":"その病院では毎年何百件もの手術が行われています。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"手術"},{"sentence":"The company's **operations** in Asia are growing rapidly.","translation":"その会社のアジアでの事業は急速に拡大しています。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"事業・業務"},{"sentence":"Basic arithmetic **operations** include addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.","translation":"基本的な算術演算には、足し算、引き算、掛け算、割り算が含まれます。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"演算"},{"sentence":"The police conducted a series of **operations** to combat drug trafficking.","translation":"警察は麻薬取引を取り締まるための一連の作戦を実施しました。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"作戦"}]}
